description: Figure 7 (BH mass distribution under different spin priors)
instructions: Reproduce the figure from the paper, which shows the posterior distribution of parameter M_BH under different spin priors. The caption of the figure states: 'Estimates of MBH for different a2 priors with pairing function beta = 0: uniform and isotropic ('U + I', black solid), non-spinning BH (default 'ZS', blue dashed), and non-spinning BH + aligned spin NS ('ZS + AS', red dotted). Posterior on MBH for the 'ZS' spin prior with beta = 3 is shown (green dash-dot). All events fit with a 1-component NS mass model.'
